poem:
### The Summit's Echo

In pursuit of knowledge, he ascended  
Through cold whispers of the wind,   
Where stars collide and truths unfold,   
The climb a metaphor of reaching—  
And in the silent grasp of the peak,  
He became a thought suspended,  
A footnote to the cosmos' unraveling,  
Stories carried on the brief breath of sky.
